title: That Time the CIA dosed a French Town with Acid: Spooky Week #1
itunes:title: That Time the CIA dosed a French Town with Acid: Spooky Week #1
description:
A look at the poisoning of the town Pont Saint Esprit, and how some mysterious bread turned hundreds of residents temporarily mad.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
